name: untiringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If someone does something untiringly, their energy, interest, or enthusiasm seems never to become weaker: work untiringly She has worked untiringly for the organization for over thirty years. She is untiringly enthusiastic and open to new ideas.
More examplesFewer examplesShe struggled untiringly against almost hopeless odds.Throughout his career, he worked untiringly to promote the cause that was so dear to him. Untiringly, he painted the rich colours of autumn, at the moment when the forests are filled with the brightest tints.
